item.title: Slack bot with Nodejs
item.description: Build your slack bot in a few steps. In this post, we’ll navigate the process of creating the bot. Slack setup # First, create a slack workspace Give your workspace a name Create a new bot at slack apps Give your new application a name Choose the workspace you created before installing the bot application Then go to the Features > OAuth & Permissions screen to scroll down to Bot Token Scopes to specify the OAuth scopes, and select app_mentions and chat_write to enable the bot to send messages.
